result.eng: I had to use all my strength.
result.ga: bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid
result.orig: Bhí orm iomlán mo nirt a chur in úsáid

result.eng: There is nothing we can do about the power of the media.
result.ga: níl neart againn ar chumhacht na meán

result.eng: The county's football team is going from strength to strength.
result.ga: tá foireann peile an chontae ag dul ó neart go neart

result.eng: There is strength and energy in me.

result.html: tá neart agus fuinneamh ionamThere is strength and energy in me.
result.ponchtml: tá neart agus fuinneaṁ ionamThere is strength and energy in me.

result.html: tá neart ama againnWe have plenty of time.

result.eng: A lot of work still needs to be done in the years ahead.

result.eng: There are plenty of shops and a supermarket there also.

result.eng: I didn't meet her, but there are plenty of people from Cois Fharraige still there.

result.eng: You can drive to plenty of places in Connemara without spending more than an hour on the road.
